Data Collection and Analysis Methods in Impact Evaluation

This document excerpt provides an overview of the Office of Research at UNICEF, which aims to improve international understanding of children's rights issues and facilitate the implementation of the Convention on the Rights of the Child. The Office produces publications that contribute to a global debate on impact evaluation methods, sharing contemporary research practice and recommendations from renowned researchers and evaluators.
